```{r}
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
file_list = 
  tibble(
    files = list.files("./data/yellow_taxi"))

read = function(file_name) {
  
  file = fread(str_c("./data/yellow_taxi/", file_name))
  
  return(file)
}

yellow_taxi = 
  file_list %>% 
  mutate(
    output = map(files, read)
  ) %>% 
  unnest(output) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

```


```{r}
drop_cols = c("passenger_count", "payment_type", "fare_amount", "extra", "mta_tax", "tip_amount", "tolls_amount", "total_amount")

yellow_taxi %>%
```
